name: i Fishing 4
description:
iFishing 4 is a fishing simulator written by an avid fisherman. Millions of gamers young and old have loved iFishing's realism and fun gameplay since 2008.

Features:
- (NEW) Contains both freshwater and saltwater fish
- Photorealistic backgrounds and fish, as close as the real thing as it gets!
- Career mode lets you buy new lures, boats, and lakes
- Upgrade your boat with faster motors and equip with a trolling motor to sneak up on fish.
- Sell your fish on the fish market to earn cash
- Buy Golden Worms using your cash to unlock new content!
- Compete with your friends to catch the biggest fish
- Take pictures of your catch and share it on social networks



Already a fan of iFishing? Like us on Facebook or Follow us on Twitter for the latest news:

facebook.com/RockingPocketGames
twitter.com/RockingPocket

Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played iFishing!
